original_text: He presented the tribute to Eglon king of Moab, who was a very fat man.
korean_text: 공물을 모압 왕 에글론에게 바쳤는데 에글론은 매우 비둔한 자였더라

sentences.original_text: He presented the tribute to Eglon king of Moab
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 모압 왕 에글론에게 조공을 바쳤다

sentences.original_text: who was a very fat man
